info.title: Indeed
info.description: Indeed is the #1 job site worldwide, with over 100 million unique visitors per month. Indeed is available in more than 50 countries and 26 languages, covering 94% of global GDP.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format. Which output format of the API you wish to use. The options are "xml" and "json." If omitted or invalid, the XML format is used.

parameters.name: jobkeys
parameters.description: Job keys. A comma separated list of job keys specifying the jobs to look up. This parameter is required.

parameters.name: v
parameters.description: Version. Which version of the API you wish to use. All publishers should be using version 2. Currently available versions are 1 and 2. This parameter is required.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Callback. The name of a javascript function to use as a callback to which the results of the search are passed. This only applies when format=json. For security reasons, the callback name is restricted letters, numbers, and the underscore character.

parameters.name: chnl
parameters.description: Channel Name: Group API requests to a specific channel

parameters.name: co
parameters.description: Search within country specified. Default is us. See below for a complete list of supported countries.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter duplicate results. 0 turns off duplicate job filtering. Default is 1.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format. Which output format of the API you wish to use. The options are "xml" and "json." If omitted or invalid, the XML format is used.

parameters.name: fromage
parameters.description: Number of days back to search.

parameters.name: highlight
parameters.description: Setting this value to 1 will bold terms in the snippet that are also present in q. Default is 0.

parameters.name: jt
parameters.description: Job type. Allowed values: "fulltime", "parttime", "contract", "internship", "temporary".

parameters.name: l
parameters.description: Location. Use a postal code or a "city, state/province/region" combination.

parameters.name: latlong
parameters.description: If latlong=1, returns latitude and longitude information for each job result. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results returned per query. Default is 10

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Callback. The name of a javascript function to use as a callback to which the results of the search are passed. This only applies when format=json. For security reasons, the callback name is restricted letters, numbers, and the underscore character.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Distance from search location ("as the crow flies"). Default is 25.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by relevance or date. Default is relevance.

parameters.name: st
parameters.description: Site type. To show only jobs from job boards use 'jobsite'. For jobs from direct employer websites use 'employer'.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start results at this result number, beginning with 0. Default is 0.

parameters.name: useragent
parameters.description: The User-Agent (browser) of the end-user to whom the job results will be displayed. This can be obtained from the "User-Agent" HTTP request header from the end-user. This field is required.

parameters.name: userip
parameters.description: The IP number of the end-user to whom the job results will be displayed. This field is required.

parameters.name: v
parameters.description: Version. Which version of the API you wish to use. All publishers should be using version 2. Currently available versions are 1 and 2. This parameter is required.
